name: Fix The Ship
description:
A game I made for a Game Jam (week 104) Had a lot of problems when it came to my pixel program and music editor, so I ended up resorting to using some stuff in the public domain (hope that was okay)

The Theme was Fix It, which I had some problems thinking of an idea, but I eventually decided your character is attempting to collect the parts needed to fix your Airship, which you was originally gonna be in, but I couldn't find a way to make good assets, and Open Pixel Project didn't have an Airship theme, so I used this one instead.

Although it's not the most indepth game, I do think the movement is fun, expecially after you get further in (you unlock powers when you collect gears), so I'd appreciate it if you give it a try! Thanks

Art Assets: Open Pixel Project: https://www.openpixelproject.com/ (I did actually do a little editing with these assets, adding in a wall slide, death animation, and spoopy badguy

Sound Effect: Free Sound: https://freesound.org/home/

Music: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=v6za-eboj1I
